rows.label: bf11700100_0030
rows.name: Nothing, just had some time to kill.

rows.label: bf11700100_0040
rows.name:
I don't think I'm the right person
for killing time with.

rows.label: bf11700100_0050
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi's the same.
Are there a lot of Blades who keep journals?

rows.label: bf11700100_0065
rows.name: Others are others, I am me.

rows.label: bf11700100_0070
rows.name: You go back to your Core when your Driver dies, right?

rows.label: bf11700100_0080
rows.name:
It's not unnatural to want to know who you were,
the next time you awaken.

rows.label: bf11700100_0090
rows.name: There's no guarantee it'll still be there, right?

rows.label: bf11700100_0105
rows.name:
Even if it's uncertain,
we still want something to cling to.

rows.label: bf11700100_0130
rows.name: For the bond with the Driver we believed in.

rows.label: bf11700100_0150
rows.name: I don't expect you to understand right now.

rows.label: bf11700100_0160
rows.name: What a nasty thing to say.

rows.label: bf11700100_0165
rows.name: You make it sound like I don't have a heart.

rows.label: bf11700100_0200
rows.name: maybe the bond you're supposed to make isn't here.

rows.label: bf11700100_0220
rows.name: That's true, but something feels different.

rows.label: bf11700100_0240
rows.name: Your bond lies in the future, not the present.

rows.label: bf11700100_0255
rows.name: A hunch. From just a regular Blade.

rows.label: bf11700100_0300
rows.name: Both you and that kid are so awkward.

rows.label: bf11700100_0305
rows.name: I couldn't just stand by and watch.
